Ekundayo Adeyinka Adeyemi (28 Febụwarị 1937 - 25 Jenụwarị 2022) bụ onye Naijiria na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye agụmakwụkwọ nke bụ prọfesọ a ma ama nke Architecture na Mahadum Covenant
N'afọ 1975, Adeyemi nwetara prọfesọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, nkwalite nke mere ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ mbụ nke Architecture na Naijiria na Sub-Saharan Africa.
A mụrụ ya nye nne na nna si Ekiti Steeti, Adeyemi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị anọ dị iche iche na steeti dị iche iche tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ ya na Ekiti Steeti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Christ's School Ado Ekiti, isi obodo steeti na 1956
N'afọ 1963, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'ihe owuwu ụlọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
N'afọ 1965, o nwetara nzere masta ya na Mahadum Columbia
Nke sochiri ya bu nzere masta ọzọ na atụmatụ obodo site na Mahadum New York na 1973

Ihe odide PhD ya bụ na Kaduna Capital Territory na Metropolitan Lagos: An Analysis of Administrative and Institutional Framework for Urban land Planning and Development ma mechaa ya n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 1974.
A na-ahụta Adeyemi dị ka prọfesọ mbụ nke architecture nke Naịjirịa, a na-akọkwa na ọ bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ mbụ nwetara ọkwa prọfesọ na architecture na Sub-Saharan Africa.
Ekundayo bụ onye so n'ọtụtụ otu ndị ọkachamara nke gụnyere Nigerian Institute of Architects, African Union of Architects na American Institute of Planners
Ekundayo malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello n'afọ 1969, ebe ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba nke imepụta gburugburu ebe obibi n'afọ 1976
E mere ya prọfesọ na mahadum n'afọ 1975
N'afọ 1982, Ekundayo gara ezumike na Mahadum Sheffield dị ka prọfesọ nleta
N'afọ 1988, a họpụtara Ekundayo ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nke Federal University of Technology Akure
N'agbata afọ 1999 na 2002, a họpụtara ya dị ka Ag
Vice Chancellor nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ

N'afọ 2004, ọ lara ezumike nká wee bụrụ onye isi nke College of Science and Technology na prọfesọ a ma ama na Mahadum Covenant A na-ewerekwa ya dị ka nna nye ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ, o nyekwara aka guzobe ngalaba Architecture na mahadum ole na ole na Naịjirịa.

N'ime nyocha nke afọ 2008 nke akpọrọ Meaning and Relevance in Nigerian Traditional Architecture: The Dialectics of growth and Change, Adeyemi nwara idozi echiche na-ezighi ezi nke bu na ndị Afrịka bi na "obodo ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ, ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ọhịa na-enweghị ekele maka ọdịdị dị na atụmatụ obodo" site n'inye nghọta banyere ihe mepụtara ụlọ ọdịnala oge ochie nke ụlọ n'ofe agbụrụ ndị isi na Naịjirịa, ebe ọ na-enye nghọta na echiche zuru oke banyere ụlọ ndị Africa nke oge ochie.

Mpempe akwụkwọ nke afọ 2014 nke akpọrọ Characteristics of Early Ecclesiastical Architecture in Lagos State in Nigeria nke Adeyemi dere na Journal for Cultural and Design Studies kwuru na oge dị n'etiti mmalite afọ 1850 ruo ngwụsị afọ 1920 malitere nnukwu oge nhazi n'ụdị ụlọ ndị e mere na Nigeria
Nnyocha ahụ nyochara ụlọ ọrụ Ndị Kraịst ise kachasị mkpa nke e wuru n'oge ahụ, ebe ọ na-atụle ihe onwunwe ha dị iche iche
Nchọpụta sitere na mbipụta ahụ bụ na e mere ụlọ ndị ahụ na obere ntinye, echiche na nkọwa sitere n'aka ndị mba na usoro eji eme ihe agbanweela kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ site na ihe a na-eji taa.
Adeyemi nwụrụ na 25 Jenụwarị 2022, mgbe ọ dị afọ 84.
